channel.title: Wikipedia article interlinkage on Slightlier Changed Project Title
channel.description: Recent content in Wikipedia article interlinkage on Slightlier Changed Project Title

item.title: Network Description and Analysis
item.description: For the research questions of this project, a graph is a suitable representation of the data. It allows us to describe each wikipedia page as a node, and a reference as a link to another node. Attributes The data we have collected for each page is added as attributes to the nodes in the graph, so we can easily analyse data on the graph after applying methods that filter and group nodes.

item.title: Text analysis
item.description: Text Analysis The text we have analysed is from the introductory paragraphs of each of the articles. We picked this text because we wanted to capture the essence of the article without having to analyse all the available text. Example of introductory paragraph Each of these texts then represented one document in our corpus, where the corpus is the entire collection of documents, either from the full data set or from the communities found within the network.
